dataList.dlg: The hammer of justice purgeth evil. Dost thou require mine aid? Fuhuhu…
…Ah, mine apologies. I give little heed to other sounds whilst I am focused on the doctrine. Hath the time for breakfast come?
When the night falleth, I shall be occupied with delivering justice… I must use this time to read the remaining passages…
…Heeheek?! Ah, hah… The masque… Will you please unmasque yourself at ordinary times? The dark made me mistake you for a heretic to purge…
In 6:18… “Yet I shall forge a vow with thee…” Heehee! A vow decreed by the One Who Grips… Heeheeheek!
An overabundance of evil prevaileth in the world… As the One Who Grips beeth simply too busy to purge them all alone, I aid her.

Ahh, so of this parchment you are curious. I transcribed the text myself… I cannot be in company with the passages of the One Who Grips at all times if they are confined to their tomes, can I…? Heeheeh.
This hammer beeth like a judge's gavel to me. With it, I aim for the heart of evil… and deliver judgement upon it.

To hear that you aid the One Who Grips in her great task relieveth me.
With you, mine own enactment of justice shall make great strides.
I cannot let precious rest go to waste.
Keehee! Ahahahah! Upstanding…! Purging.
…Mm, let us advance.
Evil shan't keep its proper form.
Hahahahah! Ah, you were by the side!
I shall pierce thee!
*Maniacal Laughter*
*Maniacal Laughter*
Rightly executed.
Krh… There are still—deeds undone…
'Twasn't a difficult task.
…This puzzleth me.
Hmm… Doth it be time for rest?
This scenery… Oh, how beautiful the lands become once trodden by the hammer of justice!
Eheeheehee… Perchance… I was powerless… to purge evil.
